generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved surface with lane markings, cobblestones, and vehicles driving on it, which is characteristic of a road.
- sidewalk: The curb and raised edge on the right side of the image, along with the presence of bollards and pedestrian areas, indicate a sidewalk.
- building: Multiple multi-story structures with windows and commercial signage are visible in the background and along the street.
- vegetation: Numerous trees with green foliage are visible along the street and in the background.
- person: A person can be seen walking on the sidewalk on the right side of the image.
- car: A black Volvo station wagon is prominently visible in the foreground, and a silver police van is visible crossing the street.
- traffic light: A red traffic light is visible on the right side of the image.
- traffic sign: A blue circular traffic sign is visible on the right side of the image.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including those supporting the traffic light and traffic signs.
- rider: A person is visible on a bicycle in the background on the right side of the image.
